classes.title: Choose your Destiny

darkWizard.name: Dark Wizard
darkWizard.description: The Dark Wizard is a master of elemental magic, capable of causing great damage at a distance. His main attribute is Energy, which increases his magical power. Although he has little defense, his ability to eliminate enemies quickly makes him a very popular class.

darkKnight.name: Dark Knight
darkKnight.description: The Dark Knight is a powerful warrior specialized in melee combat. His main attribute is Strength, which increases his physical damage. With high defense and hit points, it is ideal for players who prefer to be on the front line of battle.

fairyElf.name: Fairy Elf
fairyElf.description: The Fairy Elf is an agile archer with support skills. Her main attribute is Agility, which increases her accuracy and attack speed. She can attack at a distance and provide group support with healing and defense spells.

magicGladiator.name: Magic Gladiator
magicGladiator.description: The Magic Gladiator is a hybrid that masters both magic and weapons. He can use Dark Wizard and Dark Knight skills, making him very versatile. His attributes are balanced, allowing him to adapt to different combat situations.

darkLord.name: Dark Lord
darkLord.description: The Dark Lord is a field commander with powerful summons. His unique attribute is Command, which allows him to summon creatures and strengthen his allies. It is an ideal class for group play and leading battles.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: The Summoner is a summoner of magical creatures and spells. Her main attribute is Energy, which increases her magical power. She can summon creatures to fight for her and cast powerful control and damage spells.

rageFighter.name: Rage Fighter
rageFighter.description: The Rage Fighter is a fast fighter with devastating attacks. His main attributes are Strength and Vitality. Specialized in melee combat, he can perform combos of fast and powerful attacks.

classes.chooseClass: Choose from seven unique classes, each with their own skills and gameplay style.

registro.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
registro.termsModalTitle: Terms and Conditions of Use – ETEREAL MU
registro.termsContent:
1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS

By registering, accessing and/or using the services provided by Etereal Mu (hereinafter "the Service"), you expressly agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of the content described herein, you should not use the Service.

These Terms may be modified at any time, without prior notice. We recommend reviewing them periodically. Continued use of the Service after the publication of modifications shall constitute your acceptance of such modifications.

2. SERVICE DESCRIPTION

Etereal Mu is an unofficial private server of the MU Online video game. We provide free access to the game, as well as optional services through a virtual currency called WCoins, which can be acquired through real payments via various methods offered on our platform.

3. REGISTRATION AND ACCOUNT SECURITY

To use the Service, you must create an account by providing true, complete and updated information.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your access data. Any activity performed from your account will be your responsibility.

Etereal Mu is not responsible for unauthorized use of your account. We recommend using secure passwords and not sharing them with third parties.

4. PURCHASES, WCOINS AND NO REFUND POLICY

By purchasing WCoins, you agree that you are paying for a virtual service within a digital environment with no monetary value outside the game.

All WCoin purchases are final, non-refundable and non-transferable, without exception. This includes, but is not limited to:

  • Technical problems with the client or server
  • Account suspensions or closures for rule violations
  • Buyer regret or error
  • Service interruptions, maintenance or restarts

The user accepts this condition when registering, making any transaction, or continuing to use the Service.

5. USER CONDUCT

By using Etereal Mu, you agree not to:

  • Use cheats, hacks, bots, exploits, third-party programs or any other means to alter the functioning of the game.
  • Perform activities that harm the experience of other users, such as harassment, spam or offensive language.
  • Sell, transfer or exchange accounts or game items for real money (RMT).
  • Use the server name or game materials for commercial purposes without express authorization.
  • Commit any act that violates local, national or international laws.

Non-compliance with these rules may result in sanctions including warnings, temporary or permanent account blocks, without right to refund.

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

All graphic elements, logos, names, interfaces, custom configurations, designs and systems developed for Etereal Mu are property of the development team, except for elements licensed through Webzen or other third parties.

Copying, distribution, reproduction or modification of server content without express written authorization is prohibited.

7. SERVICE MODIFICATIONS

Etereal Mu reserves the right to:

  • Modify game configuration, including rates, item drops, content, characters, maps, events and any other aspect.
  • Perform scheduled or emergency maintenance without prior notice.
  • Suspend partially or totally the service, whether temporarily or permanently, for any justified reason.

The user understands that these changes are part of the natural development of the service and accepts that no compensation will be granted for such adjustments.

8. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

Etereal Mu is not responsible for loss of progress, items, accounts, statistics or any indirect damage that may result from the use of the service.

The game is offered "as is" and "as available", without explicit or implicit warranties.

We do not guarantee uninterrupted continuity of the service or the absence of technical errors.

9. ACCOUNT SUSPENSION AND CANCELLATION

We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts without prior notice if violations of these Terms and Conditions are detected, suspicions of illicit activity, or any conduct that affects the stability of the server or community.

10. PRIVACY AND DATA

Personal information provided is used solely for administrative purposes and for the operation of the server.

We will not share your information with third parties, except by legal obligation.

You can consult more details in our Privacy Policy.

11. FINAL PROVISIONS

By registering and using the Service, you confirm that you have read, understood and fully accepted these Terms and Conditions.

These Terms constitute the complete agreement between the user and Etereal Mu and replace any prior understanding.

If any clause is considered invalid by a competent authority, the remaining ones will continue to be valid and applicable.
registro.rulesRequired: You must accept the game rules to continue
registro.rulesContent:
These rules govern the behavior of all players within the Etereal Mu server environment. By creating an account and participating in the game, every user unconditionally agrees to comply with the following rules, acknowledging that ignorance does not exempt them from responsibility.

1. GENERAL CONDUCT

1.1. Mandatory respect: Every player must maintain respectful conduct towards other players and staff members, both inside and outside the game.

1.2. Offensive language: The use of discriminatory, racist, sexual, threatening, or hate language in any game channel or official platform is prohibited.

1.3. Defamation: Accusing without evidence, promoting rumors or misinforming about the server or its administration will be sanctioned.

1.4. Identity impersonation: It is forbidden to pretend to be a staff member, whether through name, language or images on official or unofficial networks and channels.

2. CHEATS, EXPLOITS AND ABUSE

2.1. Hacks and external programs: The use of software that modifies the client, automates actions or provides unfair advantages is strictly prohibited.

2.2. Bugs and exploits: If you find a bug or anomalous behavior, you must report it immediately. The use of any bug or exploit, even if not yet documented, will be considered abuse and sanctioned.

2.3. Multi-accounts for illicit purposes: Playing with multiple accounts (maximum 5) is allowed as long as they are not used to obtain unfair advantages (for example, autopk, auto trade, auto event, double reward, etc.). Abusive use will be sanctioned.

2.4. Gray areas: Any action that is not explicitly prohibited but seeks to take advantage of the system or evade the rules will be evaluated by the staff and may be considered sanctionable according to the exclusive criteria of the administration.

3. TRADE AND TRANSACTIONS

3.1. RMT (real money trading): It is prohibited to sell or buy accounts, items, WCoins or any game element in exchange for real money or products/services outside the official environment.

3.2. Scams between players: Every transaction within the game is the responsibility of those involved. The staff will not intervene in private negotiations nor reimburse items for scams.

3.3. Use of third-party accounts: Lending, buying or using third-party accounts is under the user's responsibility. The staff will not restore accounts or items in case of misuse, loss or theft.

3.4. WCoins and refunds: As established in the Terms and Conditions, WCoin purchases are final and non-refundable under any circumstances.

4. EVENTS AND COMPETITIONS

4.1. Conduct in events: Manipulating the result of an event, using multi-accounts to secure prizes or coordinating results with other players will be sanctioned.

4.2. Prizes and rewards: The staff reserves the right to invalidate the delivery of prizes if suspicious behavior or violation of the rules is detected.

5. INTERACTION WITH STAFF

5.1. Support abuse: Abusive use of the ticket system, social media messages or false or repetitive reports will not be tolerated. This includes harassing staff for decisions already made.

5.2. Staff authority: Staff decisions are final and unappealable, except in cases where a technical or administrative error is clearly proven.

5.3. Defiant or sarcastic attitudes towards staff, even if they do not contain explicit insults, may be sanctioned if they are considered to alter the order or respect of the community.

6. SANCTIONS POLICY

6.1. Types of sanctions: Sanctions can range from warnings, temporary blocks, loss of items, character deletion or permanent blocking of accounts, IPs or devices.

6.2. Recidivism: Sanctions are progressively aggravated according to the severity and recidivism of the player.

6.3. Administrative criteria: The staff may apply sanctions at discretion when the player's behavior compromises the health of the server or violates the spirit of the rules, even if the fact is not explicitly detailed in this regulation.

7. UPDATES AND CHANGES

7.1. Changes to the rules: These rules may be modified at any time without prior notice. It will be notified through official channels. Continued use of the game implies acceptance of any modification.

7.2. Retroactivity: Rules may be applied retroactively if continued abuse is discovered that affects the balance or integrity of the server.

8. GENERAL ABUSE CLAUSE

Any action, omission or behavior that aims to obtain undue advantage or harm the server, community or its administration —even if not specifically prohibited in this document— may be sanctioned. The attempt to exploit ambiguities in the rules for personal benefit will be considered a serious offense.

Last update: May 27, 2025
Official document – Etereal Mu
